subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Just before he began an early-evening workout with Andy Roddick, who faces Roger Federer Wednesday night, Jimmy Connors said: “I think he’s played him enough, he knows about him.”
snippet: Just before he began an early-evening workout with Andy Roddick, who faces Roger Federer Wednesday night, Jimmy Connors said: “I think he’s played him enough, he knows about him.”
